nodes.text: The southeast quadrant was an area of Republic Mobile Surgical Unit 7 built on the planet Drongar for use in the Clone Wars during or prior to 30 BBY. The area was next to a back-up shield generator and was designated as the staging area during evacuation for a number of the bases staff. When Separatist forces attack the base the staff evacuated from the site included Human surgeon Jos Vondar, Zabrak surgeon Zan Yant, Lorrdian nurse Tolk le Trene, Equani minder Klo Merit and Mirialan Jedi Padawan Barriss Offee.
Southeast quadrant first appeared in MedStar I: Battle Surgeons, the first novel in the MedStar Duology written by Steve Perry and Michael Reaves and published in 2004.
